comment: /**  * Resets MBeanServerFactory and ManagementFactory to a known consistent state.  * This involves releasing all currently registered MBeanServers and resetting  * the platformMBeanServer to null.  */
code: /**  * Resets MBeanServerFactory and ManagementFactory to a known consistent state.  * This involves releasing all currently registered MBeanServers and resetting  * the platformMBeanServer to null.  */ public static void resetMBeanServers() throws Exception {     for (MBeanServer server : MBeanServerFactory.findMBeanServer(null)) {         MBeanServerFactory.releaseMBeanServer(server).     }     Field field = ManagementFactory.class.getDeclaredField("platformMBeanServer").     field.setAccessible(true).     field.set(null, null). }
